info.title: SubscriberAnalyzer
info.description: The definitions in this swagger specification will be used for Mobile Packet Core Subscriber Analyzer resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a Mobile Packet Core subscriber analyzer

parameters.name: subscriberAnalyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the subscriber analyzer object.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about the specified Mobile Packet Core subscriber analyzer

parameters.name: subscriberAnalyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the subscriber analyzer object.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Mobile Packet Core subscriber analyzer.

parameters.name: subscriberAnalyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the subscriber analyzer object.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update Mobile Packet Core subscriber analyzer tags.

parameters.name: subscriberAnalyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the subscriber analyzer object.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the update device tags operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the subscriber analyzers in a mobile packet core instance.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns a list of component resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ResultCodeAction.description: Action to be performed on the session based on the result code

RgLevelResultCodeAction.description: Action to be performed on the session based on the result code

ChargingResultCodeActionTemplate.description: Configure error codes from chf and the actions to be performed on the session

applicationError.description: Configure application error codes and the actions

applicationErrorCode.description: Application error codes from CHF server

ChargingRgLevelResultCodeActionTemplate.description: Configure list of expected RG level error result codes from CHF and any action to be taken

resultCode.description: RG level application error codes from CHF server

applicationError.description: Configure application error codes and the actions

rgApplicationErrorCode.description: Application error codes from CHF server

items.description: Value of the custom filter (only if matchCriteria does not equal 'presence'

uplinkAmbr.description: per session Uplink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate

downlinkAmbr.description: per session Downlink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate

items.description: session level default qos attributes.  nonGbrFlow = true, relective-qos = false

arpPriorityLevel.description: allocation & retention priority:  higher values are preferred

AnalyzerNameType.description: Specific name type used by analyzer objects

FilterSetsSmf.description: List of filterset for the given class (profile instance). A filterset can have multiple filters. All filters in filterset have to match for a class name to be chosen. If any one filterset matches, the class name associated with this filterset will be chosen

filters.description: Filters to be applied to match the filterset. All filters needs to be matched.  Only one filter per object can be specified - it's identified by the

smfFilterType.description: Type of filter specified.  Must be unique in the same filterset

FilterSetsAmf.description: List of filterset for the given class (profile instance). A filterset can have multiple filters. All filters in filterset have to match for a class name to be chosen. If any one filterset matches, the class name associated with this filterset will be chosen

filters.description: Filters to be applied to match the filterset. All filters needs to be matched.  Only one filter per object can be specified - it's identified by the

amfFilterType.description: Type of filter specified.  Must be unique in the same filterset

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

items.description: URL identifying a packet detection rule with firewall service policy.

priority.description: Priority of the charging profile has to be unique across the Profile-Analyzers.

filters.description: Charging Profile Key. Method of procedure for modifying the Profile-Key: Remove the whole profile-key 'no profile-key <>'; commit; configure the profile-key with the updated configuration 'profile-key <>'; commit

onlineEnabled.description: default online charging enabled/disabled at PDU Session.  One of online or offline must be enabled

offlineEnabled.description: default offline charging enabled/disabled at PDU Session.  One of online or offline must be enabled

usageReportingLevel.description: default usage reporting-level when not provided in a policy charging data

maxNumberOfChargeConditionChange.description: max number of changes in charging condition to send explicit trigger

periodicReportingTimer.description: measurement period for generating periodic reports (in seconds)

triggerTemplate.description: associated to chargable events trigger template

volumeLimitValue.description: volume limit(threshold) bytes for session level volume reporting

defaultQuotaVolumeQuotaTotal.description: Default Volume Quota(bytes) in both Uplink Downlink Directions

defaultQuotaMaxNumDefaultQuota.description: Max Number of Times a Session can be assigned Default Quota.  Zero means Unlimited Number of Default Quota Allocation

chfDefaultValidityTime.description: Default quota validity time if validity timer is missing in the CHF response

chfDefaultQuotaHoldingTime.description: Default QHT if QHT is missing in the CHF response

items.description: Online charging parameters.  must: default-quota-volume-quota-threshold < default-quota-volume-quota-total

initialMsgResultCodeActions.description: During create sessions, actions to be taken on the session based on the CHF returned error-code

updateMsgResultCodeActions.description: During update sessions, actions to be taken on the session based on the CHF returned error-code

chfServerDiscoveryThroughNrf.description: enable chf server discovery through nrf when PCF does not provide

reflectiveQosTimer.description: reflective qos timer value in seconds

smfSubscriberManagementProfile.description: subscriber management profile to support subscriber data

precedence.description: Defines the precedence of this instance. A smaller value is higher priority

fiveQiDscpMap.description: Configure 5qi to dscp mapping.  fiveQi and arpPriorityLevel combination must be unique per item

defaultDscp.description: default dscp is used when 5qi isn't configured in five-qi-dscp-map

defaultPagePolicyIndicate.description: default ppi is used when dscp value isn't configured in dscp-ppi-map

pageTimeout.description: Page Timeout Value in milliseconds - the length of time to wait for a UE to be paged before discarding buffered data

maxDownlinkPacketsToBuffer.description: Maximum number of downlink data packets to buffer per flow when UE is being paged

arpPriorityLevelThreshold.description: Flows with ARP Priority Level values equal to or less than this threshold value will be marked for priority use

downlinkPacketBufferingCapability.description: Indicates if SMF supports buffering data packets when UE is being paged

allowedSscModes.description: list of allowed-ssc-modes for the the subscriber

allowedPduSessionTypes.description: list of allowed-pdu-session-types for the the subscriber

qosFlowInactivityTimerMap.description: Configure QosFlow i.e. 5qi+arp(key) to inactivity-timer mapping.  fiveQi and arpPriorityLevel combination must be unique per item

qosFlowInactivityTimer.description: Inactivity timer duration for 5qi+arp_pl combination in seconds[0-2160000]

precedence.description: Defines the precedence of this instance. A smaller value is higher priority

pccRules.description: list of pcc rules to be associated

pccRuleBase.description: list of pcc rule base objects to be associated

items.description: URL to PCC Rule Base resource

responseCode.description: HTTP Response Codes.  If PCF response matches the response code the session is continued using the default policy profile

defaultSubscriberPolicyProfile.description: Default Policy profile to be used in case of error in policy create response code

pccRules.description: list of pcc rules to be associated

pccRuleBase.description: list of pcc rule bases to be associated

items.description: URL to PCC Rule Base resource

sessionRules.description: session rule to apply default qos and ambr

reflectiveQosTimer.description: reflective qos timer value in seconds

pcfDownSessionHoldTime.description: pcf down session hold time in seconds

supportedPcfFeatures.description: List of Supported Features for PCF Interface

precedence.description: Defines the precedence of this instance. A smaller value is higher priority

n3NetworkInstance.description: Network instance (context) name for the N3 interface

n6NetworkInstance.description: Network instance (context) name for the N6 interface

n9NetworkInstance.description: Network instance (context) name for the N9 interface

s5s8uS2buNetworkInstance.description: Network instance (context) name for the s5/s8/s2b interfaces

mobilityPolicy.description: Parameters to control access and mobility policy.  AMF

precedence.description: Defines the precedence of this instance. A smaller value is higher priority

default.description: whether this is the default instance.  If true then the filterSets field is not needed (ignored if specified).  There can only be one default profile

reselectPcfOnMm5gRelocation.description: Defines support for PCF re-selection on target AMF. Default: disable

forwardPcfIdToSmf.description: Defines PCF-Id to be forwarded to SMF or not. Default: disable

uePolicyControlPolicyAssociation.description: Defines support for UE Policy Association Establishment with PCF. Default: ue-requested

amPolicyControlPolicyAssociation.description: Defines support for AM Policy Association Establishment with PCF. Default: never

accessReject.description: Access reject cause for the subscriber

sliceSelectionSelectionPolicy.description: Indicates the policy for slice selection

sliceSelectionRejectCause.description: Describes cause code for registration-reject. Default: causeNoSuitableCellInTa.

sliceSelectionSliceNegotiationDuringN26H.description: Controls slice selection during N26 Handover. Default: enable

coreNetworkRestrictions.description: Core network type restrictions applicable for a UE

ratRestrictions.description: 3GPP Radio Access Technology restrictions applicable for an UE

serviceAreaRestrictions.description: Service Area restrictions applicable for a UE

plmnId.description: Supported PLMN identity; Range: numbers with 5-6 digits

restrictionType.description: If the list of tracking areas are allowed or disallowed

items.description: Tracking Area Code (TAC); Valid values are hexadecimal values of length 4 or 6 with a leading '0x'

smsSupport.description: Controls Short Message Service (SMS) support. Default: disable

imsVopsSupport.description: List of IMS Voice over PS support options

imsEmergencySupport.description: Defines how UE obtains emergency service (fallback to EPS or provided by the 5G network)

items.description: The entry with 'deregistration-type' set to all is already present, no other entry is allowed to be configured; The 'deregistration-type' with value all is not allowed when entries with other deregistration types are already configured; The 'deregistration-type' with value all is not allowed when entries with other deregistration types are already configured

lcsSupport.description: Controls location service support. Default: disable

lcsNetworkInducedLocationRequestNiLrSupp.description: Controls Network Induced - Location Request procedure initiation. Default: enableWithInitialPositioning

lcsNetworkInducedLocationRequestHorizont.description: Describes NI-LR measurement for horizontal accuracy. Default: 50; Unit: meters

lcsNetworkIncludedLocationRequestVertica.description: Describes NI-LR measurement for vertical accuracy. Default: 0; Unit: meters

lcsNetworkIncludedLocationRequestEmergen.description: Specifies which node sends target node id to the GMLC. Default: sourceNode

lcsNetworkIncludedLocationRequestRespons.description: Controls initial NI-LR QoS response time. Default: delayTolerant

lcsNetworkIncludedLocationRequestQosClas.description: Describes NI-LR QoS class type. Default: bestEffort

lcsNasNotificationTimerTlcsn.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to a NAS Notification invoke request sent to the UE; Default: 10; Unit: seconds

ueRegistrationRetryDelayT3502Value.description: Delay time before the UE retries a registration procedure after five consecutive failed attempts; Default: 12; Unit: minutes

uePeriodicRegistrationT3512Value.description: Periodic registration procedure timer. Values in range 32..310 must be a multiple of 10, values in range 311..1860 must be a multiple of 60, values in range 1861..18600 must be a multiple of 600, and 19200. Default 60; Unit: minutes.  Values in range 32..310 must be a multiple of 10, values in range 311..1860 must be a multiple of 60, values in range 1861..18600 must be a multiple of 600, and 19200.

uePeriodicRegistrationT3512Source.description: Source for the periodic registration timer value sent to the UE as defined in 3GPP NAS standard section 8.2.7 of TS 24.501. If a subscribed value is not yet received from the UDM, then local-config will be used. Default: localConfig

networkInitDeregistrationT3522.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to a deregistration request sent to the UE; Default: 6000; Unit: milliseconds

networkInitDeregistrationRetryN3522.description: Defines the number of retries the AMF performs for the network initiated deregistration procedure; Default: 2

registrationAcceptT3550.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to a registration accept; Default: 6000; Unit: milliseconds

registrationAcceptRetryN3550.description: Defines the number of retries the AMF performs for a registration accept; Default: 3

gutiLifetime.description: Defines the life time of a current 5G-GUTI; Default: 12; Unit: hours

identityT3570.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to an identity request; Default: 6000; Unit: milliseconds

identityRetryN3570.description: Defines the number of retries the AMF performs for an identity request; Default: 2

mobileReachableTimer.description: Defines the duration the UE can stay IDLE without messaging the AMF; t3512plus4, t3512times2plus1, Default: t3512plus4; Unit: minutes

taiListMax.description: Defines the number of TAIs which can be stored for a particular UE; Default: 1

taiListAllocation.description: Defines the PLMN based restriction for TAI list; Default: unrestricted

configurationUpdateT3555.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to a configuration update command; Default: 6000; Unit: milliseconds

configurationUpdateRetryN3555.description: Defines the number of retries the AMF performs for a configuration update command; Default: 4

optionalGutiReallocationUeInitServiceReq.description: Controls if the AMF allocates a new GUTI during UE inititated Service Request procedure. Default: disable

optionalGutiReallocationMobilityRegReque.description: Controls if the AMF allocates a new GUTI during Mobility Registration procedure. Default: enable

optionalGutiReallocationPeriodicRegReque.description: Controls if the AMF allocates a new GUTI during Periodic Registration procedure. Default: enable

non3gppValuesDeregistrationTimer.description: Defines the non-3GPP deregistration timer value. This is sent in registration accept towards UE. Default: 54

securityT3560.description: Defines the duration the AMF waits for a response to authentication and security mode; Default: 6000; Unit: milliseconds

securityRetryN3560.description: Defines the number of retries the AMF performs for authentication request and security mode command; Default: 2

items.description: Defines the list of 5G ciphering algorithms that can be used for NAS ciphering. Valid values are nea0, nea1 and nea2 in any order or combination, with order indicating preference. SNOW3G (nea1) algorithm for NAS ciphering is considered compromised, and is not recommended. Default: nea2,nea0

Defines the list of 5G integrity algorithms that can be used for NAS integrity protection. Valid values are null, nia1 and nia2 in any order or combination, with order indicating preference. Default: nia1,nia2,null

Defines the list of EPS ciphering algorithms that can be used for NAS ciphering. Valid values are eea0, eea1 and eea2 in any order or combination, with order indicating preference. SNOW3G (eea1) algorithm for NAS ciphering is considered compromised, and is not recommended. Default: eea2,eea0

Defines the list of EPS integrity algorithms that can be used for NAS integrity protection. Valid values are null, eia1 and eia2 in any order or combination, with order indicating preference. Default: eia1,eia2,null
Additional events for which AMF performs authentication

additionalSecurityForEpsAlgorithms.description: Controls support of an additional security procedure in order to provide the selected EPS security algorithms to the UE when the AMF supports N26 interface and the UE indicates support of S1-mode. This attribute is applicable only when 'amf-cc interface nas version' is set to '15.6.0'. A value of 'disable' is compliant to TS 24.501 v15.6.0. A value of 'enable' is compliant to v16.6.0. Default: disable

precedence.description: The precedence in the paging profile set of this paging profile. Lower value indicates higher precedence.  Must be unique within a paging profile

triggersQi.description: List of 5G QoS identifiers used to match this paging profile

triggersService.description: List of services used to match this paging profile

triggersArp.description: List of Allocation & Retention Priorities (ARP) used to match this paging profile

triggersPpi.description: List of Paging Policy Indicators (PPI) used to match this paging profile

t3513Initial.description: Defines the wait time for the initial page attempt. Default: 5000; Unit: milliseconds

t3513Increment.description: Defines the additional delay added to retried page attempts. Default: 2000; Unit: milliseconds

n3513Retry.description: Defines the number of paging retries the AMF performs before declaring paging failure. Default: 2

initialPagingTarget.description: Defines initial paging target. Default: taListt

pagingPriority.description: Defines the paging priority. Lower value indicates higher priority as described in TS 38.413 section 9.3.1.78. Default: none

properties.description: Mobile Packet Core Subscriber Analyzer properties.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

value.description: A list of MobilePacketCore subscriberAnalyzer objects in a subscription or resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SubscriberAnalyzerListResult.description: Response for MobilePacketCore SubscriberAnalyzer API service call.
